name: Khalil Spanta
story: Qadeer Ghafurzai was born and raised in a small village in the mountains of Afghanistan. His family has been living in the same village for generations and he grew up learning all the skills required to survive in the mountainous terrain. After the Taliban took control of the nearby city, Qadeer's family migrated to Iran in search of a better life. Qadeer joined the Iranian Army at the age of 16 and has since proven himself to be a capable soldier. He was recruited by the OPFOR and is now a Missile Specialist (AT) with the rank of Corporal. Qadeer is determined to fight for his faith and his country, and hopes to one day return to Afghanistan to liberate his ancestral homeland from the Taliban.
